databaseoperation.name: getEntireStateList
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select description as description1,*,CASE WHEN ISNULL(is_client_applicable,0) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS showInBold from state_lku where is_onboarding_applicable = 1 order by description asc

databaseoperation.name: getW9DataFromTBlAgencyAppointmentRequest
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select w9_legal_name,w9_type_id,agency_taxpayer_short_nm,irs_tax_nm_1,irs_tax_nm_2 from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid = #aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getTerritoryId
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: SELECT (SELECT TOP 1 wrs.workflow_function FROM workflowrequestsstatus wrs WHERE wrs.workflowrequests_id = wr.workflowrequests_id ORDER BY workflowrequestsstatus_id DESC) AS workflow_function ,(SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM tbl_invitation_status_lku WHERE invitation_status_id=wr.workflowstatus_id) AS aar_statusid_desc FROM workflowrequests wr WHERE objecttype='Onboarding' AND wr.objectid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getCorporationPartnershipList
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select row_number() over(order by corporation_partnership_details_id) rownum,name,title,ind_experience,aar_requestid, corporation_partnership_details_id from tbl_corporation_partnership_details where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getIsExternalAgency1
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select is_external_request from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid = #aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getTaxIdCountForAgency
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select count(aar_taxid) as tax_id_count from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest with(nolock) where aar_requestid = #aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getEntireStateList
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select description as description1,*,CASE WHEN ISNULL(is_client_applicable,0) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS showInBold from state_lku where is_onboarding_applicable = 1 order by description asc

databaseoperation.name: getW9DataFromTBlAgencyAppointmentRequest
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select w9_legal_name,w9_type_id,agency_taxpayer_short_nm,irs_tax_nm_1,irs_tax_nm_2 from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid = #aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getTerritoryId
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: SELECT (SELECT TOP 1 wrs.workflow_function FROM workflowrequestsstatus wrs WHERE wrs.workflowrequests_id = wr.workflowrequests_id ORDER BY workflowrequestsstatus_id DESC) AS workflow_function ,(SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM tbl_invitation_status_lku WHERE invitation_status_id=wr.workflowstatus_id) AS aar_statusid_desc FROM workflowrequests wr WHERE objecttype='Onboarding' AND wr.objectid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getCorporationPartnershipList
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select row_number() over(order by corporation_partnership_details_id) rownum,name,title,ind_experience,aar_requestid, corporation_partnership_details_id from tbl_corporation_partnership_details where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getIsExternalAgency1
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select is_external_request from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid = #aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getTaxIdCountForAgency
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select count(aar_taxid) as tax_id_count from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest with(nolock) where aar_requestid = #aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getAgencyLobMasterDetail
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select lob_id as agency_lob_id ,lob_code as agency_lob_code,description as agency_lob_desc from lob_lku where description='Commercial Lines' order by description

databaseoperation.name: getApplicationDetails
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: SELECT (SELECT TOP 1 wrs.workflow_function FROM workflowrequestsstatus wrs WHERE wrs.workflowrequests_id = wr.workflowrequests_id ORDER BY workflowrequestsstatus_id DESC) AS workflow_function ,(SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM tbl_invitation_status_lku WHERE invitation_status_id=wr.workflowstatus_id) AS aar_statusid_desc FROM workflowrequests wr WHERE objecttype='Onboarding' AND wr.objectid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getAgencyAssociationValues
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select agency_association,agency_comparativerate from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getAppointmentStatesData
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select * from tbl_appointmentstates where request_id=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getAllEODocumentsDetail
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select carrier_other,cast(policy_limit as numeric(16,0)) as policy_limit,eo_claims,effective_date,eoclaims_comments from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getAllCyberLiabilityDocumentsDetail
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select carrier_other as cyber_liability_carrier_other,policy_number as cyber_liability_policy_number,coverage_amount as cyber_liability_coverage_amount,cast(policy_limit as numeric(16,0)) as cyber_liability_policy_limit,effective_date as cyber_liability_effective_date,expiration_date as cyber_liability_expiration_date,cyber_liability_claims, comments as cyber_liability_eoclaims_comments, 'Y' as cyber_liability_eo_claims_declaration from tbl_agency_cyber_liability where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getStateAbbreviation
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select abbreviation as state_abbreviation from state_lku where state_id = #state_id#

databaseoperation.name: getStateAbbreviation
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select abbreviation as state_abbreviation from state_lku where state_id = #state_id#

databaseoperation.name: getStateAbbreviation
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select abbreviation as state_abbreviation from state_lku where state_id = #state_id#

databaseoperation.name: getYAccountRowCount
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select count(*) as 'YAccountRowCount' from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where y_account=#y_account# and aar_requestid!=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getStateCount
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select count(*) as stateCount from tbl_appointmentstates where request_id=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: insertAgenyAppointmentStates
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: insert into tbl_appointmentstates(request_id,state_ids,residentnonresident_licence,last_updated_by,last_updated_ts) values(#aar_requestid#,#state_ids#,1,#last_updated_by#,#last_updated_ts#)

databaseoperation.name: updateAgenyAppointmentStates
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: update tbl_appointmentstates set state_ids=#state_ids# where request_id=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getRequestDataForAgent
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select territory_id,country_code,aar_streetaddress1 as addressline1,aar_streetaddress2 as addressline2, aar_city as city,aar_state as state,county_id,aar_zipcode as zipcode,aar_phoneno as phoneno, extn,aar_fax as fax,mobile,email as e_mail,aar_statusid from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: updateAgenyAssociation
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: update tbl_agencyappointmentrequest set agency_association=#agency_association#,agency_comparativerate=#agency_comparativerate_selected# where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getIsExternalAgency
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select is_external_request from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid = #aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getTerritoryId
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select territory_id,country_code,aar_state from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: checkProgramNoRowCount
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select count(*) as 'programNoRowCount' from business_segment where (agency_id >0 and business_segment_type=0 and is_active=1 and business_segment_code=#program_no#)

databaseoperation.name: checkProgramNo
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select business_segment_name as 'program_name' from business_segment where (agency_id >0 and business_segment_type=0 and is_active=1 and business_segment_code=#program_no#)

databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select aar_statusid from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getYAccountRowCount
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select count(*) as 'YAccountRowCount' from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where y_account=#y_account# and aar_requestid!=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getStateCount
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select count(*) as stateCount from tbl_appointmentstates where request_id=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: insertAgenyAppointmentStates
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: insert into tbl_appointmentstates(request_id,state_ids,residentnonresident_licence,last_updated_by,last_updated_ts) values(#aar_requestid#,#state_ids#,1,#last_updated_by#,#last_updated_ts#)

databaseoperation.name: updateAgenyAppointmentStates
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: update tbl_appointmentstates set state_ids=#state_ids# where request_id=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select aar_statusid from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: updateAgenyAssociation
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: update tbl_agencyappointmentrequest set agency_association=#agency_association#,agency_comparativerate=#agency_comparativerate_selected# where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select is_external_request from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid = #aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select abbreviation as state_abbreviation from state_lku where state_id = #state_id#

databaseoperation.name: chkOtherAgencyLocation
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select master_lookup_data_code from master_lookup_data_lku where master_lookup_data_id =#agency_location#
